commitResults.messageBody: Added the base functionality per week 1 + tag to the project.

commitResults.messageTitle: Implement input management and exit prompt
commitResults.messageBody: Created a taskManager() to handle the input prompt from the user, and added a Scanner function for input itself from the user. Using input "bye" from the user will stop the program via the while loop utilizing isRunning boolean.

added the functionality to add new prompts to a list, as well as the ability to list items via taskManager().

Future functionality would be to not include blank lines in the item list.

From previous input, created a method to handle blank input, and implemented markDone and unmarkDone for tasks in the Bruce program.

Future functionality would be to push for an response if task already has been marked done or undone.
